name: Yashu
wishText: May the Good friends you made be always  with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Yashu!! ohhhhhh! Many many happy blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it, And also call only if you want too and when you are free :D
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again
